mapper.select: SELECT l.lodge_no, l.mem_no, bc.building_case_no, bc.building_case, l.lodge_case_no, lodge_case, lodge_name, lodge_capacity, lodge_room, lodge_addr, convenient_facility, convenient_area, ready_time, available_term, stay_cost, check_in_time, regit_date, latitude, longitude, i.stored_name profile_stored_name FROM lodge l , lodge_case lc, building_case bc , image i WHERE l.lodge_case_no = lc.lodge_case_no AND l.lodge_case_no = bc.building_case_no AND l.mem_no = i.mem_no(+) AND l.lodge_no = #{lodge_no}
SELECT image_no, origin_name, stored_name, lodge_no, mem_no FROM image WHERE lodge_no = #{lodge_no}
SELECT convenient_facility FROM lodge WHERE lodge_no = #{lodge_no}
SELECT convenient_area FROM lodge WHERE lodge_no = #{lodge_no}

SELECT c.comment_no,c.parent_comment_no,c.lodge_no,c.contents,m.mem_no,m.mem_name,written_time, i.stored_name FROM comment_tb c,member m, image i WHERE c.mem_no = m.mem_no AND c.mem_no = i.mem_no(+) AND c.lodge_no = 175 ORDER BY comment_no desc
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_tb WHERE lodge_no = ${lodge_no}

SELECT c.comment_no,c.parent_comment_no,c.lodge_no,c.contents,m.mem_no,m.mem_name,written_time, i.stored_name FROM comment_tb c,member m,image i WHERE c.mem_no = m.mem_no AND c.mem_no = i.mem_no(+) AND c.lodge_no = #{lodge_no} AND c.parent_comment_no =#{parent_comment_no} ORDER BY comment_no desc
